regex.name: makelist
regex.expres:
#$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client import re, urllib, base64, xbmcgui, json
main = '' main += client.request('https://albaniaiptv.com/category/usa/') link = client.parseDOM(main, 'div', attrs = {'class': 'td_module_1 td_module_wrap td-animation-stack'}) link = [(client.parseDOM(i, 'a', ret='href') , client.parseDOM(i, 'img', ret='src') , client.parseDOM(i, 'img', ret='title')) for i in link] link = [(i[0][0], i[1][0], i[2][0]) for i in link] return link

regex.name: cosmix
regex.expres:
#$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client import re, urllib, base64, xbmcgui, json html = client.request('[makelist.param1]') express = '

<\/p>' links = re.compile(express, re.MULTILINE|re.DOTALL).findall(html)[0] main = client.request(links) express1 = '#EXTINF:.+?,(.+?)\n(.+?)\s' list = re.compile(express1, re.MULTILINE|re.DOTALL).findall(main) return list
